content:
I am a tennis fan and I am interested in the ATP tour. Can you provide me with the top 10 official ATP single players rankings by last Monday?
Begin!

I'll help you retrieve the top 10 official ATP singles players rankings from last Monday.

Thought: To get the official ATP singles rankings, I'll use the official_atp_players_rankings_for_ultimate_tennis function. I'll set the category to "singles", request 10 players, and use the most recent Monday's date.

name: official_atp_players_rankings_for_ultimate_tennis
